name: elite-epayment-ecosystem
description: Elite e-Payment Ecosystem for Africa - TWEEK 2025 Hackathon

scripts.setup: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:deps: npm install && npm run setup:services && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Please update .env with your actual values'
scripts.setup:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../audit-service && npm install && cd ../pricing-service && npm install
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:audit" "npm run dev:pricing" "npm run dev:workers"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../user-service && npm run build && cd ../payment-service && npm run build && cd ../audit-service && npm run build && cd ../pricing-service && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:integration
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.stop:prod: pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all

author: Elite Payment Team
